Key Match Events: The Mavericks outscored the Magic 13-2 in the final 3:10 of the first quarter
Orlando missed its last six field goal attempts, including a full-court heave at the buzzer
Miscellaneous Highlights: Orlando played its second game without Paolo Banchero, the No. 1 overall pick in the 2022 draft and 2023 Rookie of the Year, who suffered a torn right oblique last Wednesday.
Orlando was outscored 52-36 in the paint and were a season-worst 19.5% on 3-pointers (8 of 41).
Dallas outscored Orlando 19-12 in fast-break points and finished with a season-high 53 rebounds.
